item.title: XSSF: fix(bug 61203)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 61203) - XSSF: XSSFDrawing.getAnchorFromParent handles CTOneCellAnchor incorrectly, ignores CTAbsoluteAnchor

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56557) - SXSSF: Output file get corrupted with SXSSFWorkbook and "chart sheet"

item.title: SL Common: fix(bug 61169)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 61169) - SL Common: Text with Japanese characters overflows textbox

item.title: XSSF: add
item.description: add by POI Developers - XSSF: XSSFTable improved support for creating columns and setting table areas, without needing to use CT classes

item.title: XSSF: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - XSSF: XSSFTable should format numeric/date cells when used as Column Header names as Excel does

item.title: XSSF: fix(bug 58325)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58325) - XSSF: XSSFDrawing.getShapes() returns zero if sheet has more than one embedded OLE object

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 61119) - SL Common: Fix preset shape rendering and shading

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 61059) - HSSF: Allow workbooks to contain more than 32k names

item.description: update by POI Developers (bug github-54) - XSSF: Decrease execution time and memory consumption when adding XSSFPictures to an XSSFWorkbook
